module: Module-level comment: The VGA_Subsystem_VGA_PLL module configures a PLL for VGA timing. It accepts a reference clock (`ref_clk_clk`) and reset (`ref_reset_reset`) to output a VGA-specific clock (`vga_clk_clk`) and a synchronized reset (`reset_source_reset`). Internally, it monitors the PLL lock status via `video_pll_locked_export` to ensure stable operations, utilizing submodules for clock generation and reset synchronization.
